dcterms:creator: M. Raissi
P. Perdikaris
G. E. Karniadakis
dcterms:description: A framework for Gaussian processes regression constrained by boundary value problems, which can infer the solution of a well-posed boundary value problem with known second-order differential operator and boundary conditions, using scattered observations of the source term.
dcterms:title: Gaussian Process Regression (GPR) Framework

dcterms:creator: M. Raissi
P. Perdikaris
G. E. Karniadakis
dcterms:description: A deep learning framework for solving forward and inverse problems involving nonlinear partial differential equations, which incorporates physical constraints into the learning process.
dcterms:title: Physics-informed Neural Networks

dcterms:creator: L. Swiler
M. Gulian
A. Frankel
C. Safta
J. Jakeman
dcterms:description: A survey of constrained Gaussian process regression, discussing various approaches and implementation challenges in the context of enforcing constraints on Gaussian processes.
dcterms:title: Constrained Gaussian Process Regression

dcterms:creator: M. Raissi
P. Perdikaris
G. E. Karniadakis
dcterms:description: A study on the use of Gaussian processes for machine learning of linear differential equations, focusing on the application of GPR to infer solutions under linear constraints.
dcterms:title: Linear Differential Equations

dcterms:creator: C. E. Rasmussen
C. K. Williams
dcterms:description: A comprehensive resource on Gaussian processes for machine learning, covering theoretical foundations and practical applications.
dcterms:title: Gaussian Processes for Machine Learning

dcterms:creator: J. Sacks
W. J. Welch
T. J. Mitchell
H. P. Wynn
dcterms:description: A foundational paper on the design and analysis of computer experiments, providing statistical methodologies for experimental design.
dcterms:title: Design and Analysis of Computer Experiments

dcterms:creator: A. Solin
S. SÃ¤rkka
dcterms:description: A study on Hilbert space methods for reduced-rank Gaussian process regression, focusing on efficient computational techniques.
dcterms:title: Hilbert Space Methods for Reduced-Rank Gaussian Process Regression
